title: Lack of Polish signs after a while.
author: notes90
body_snippet:
Hello,

Me as well as many of my co-workers are struggling the same problem.
After a while with one or more connection opened with mRemote we loose availabity of writing polish sings on main computer which has mRemote application open. We're unable to write signs such as  : śćźżąćłó. We've checked keybord & langugage option and nothing helps. However restarting mRemote helps but after while problem is returning.

If more informations are needed please feel free to ask, I'll try to deliver t...

iterations.description: Issue is from 2018 on Windows 7 with very old mRemoteNG versions (1.72-1.75), unclear if it still reproduces on current v1.81.0 with modern Windows and .NET 10, and the root cause (keyboard hook interference?) is not identified

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet:
Are you saying that you can't type any Polish characters on the local system with mRemoteNG running on it after some time?

What version of mRemoteNG? What version of Windows?

comments.author: notes90
comments.snippet:
Yes, that's exactly what I meant.
I've got mRemote 1.72.5065.32737
But one of my co-workers has 1.74 and problem still exists there.

We all have same OS ( working in one company) Win 7 Enterprise SP 1

notes:
AI triage: Issue is from 2018 on Windows 7 with very old mRemoteNG versions (1.72-1.75), unclear if it still reproduces on current v1.81.0 with modern Windows and .NET 10, and the root cause (keyboard hook interference?) is not identified
Approach: Request reproduction on current version with modern OS; if confirmed, investigate potential keyboard hook or input method interference in the RDP/connection hosting code
